title: Comparative study between UVB 313 nm, UVC 254 nm, and far UVC 222 nm light on the aging of polyamide 66
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Abel Hurtado Macias, M. Román-Aguirre, R.P. Talamantes, Karen M. Soto, José Luis Reyes Araiza, Nestor Méndez-Lozano, Miguel Apátiga-Castro, Jorge Pineda-Piñón, José Ramon Gasca Tirado, José M. López-Romero, A. Manzano-Ramírez
